channel.title: Docker on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Will Schenk

item.title: Setting up a chromebook for development
item.description: I just switch my pixelbook back to the stable channel, and this is what I did to get back to developing on it. First: Open up settings Linux (Beta) Turn on Wait for it to download Startup the terminal app Everything from here happens in the terminal app. Configure git git config --global user.email "you@example.com" git config --global user.name "Your Name" Install Docker Install docker the normal way
